parameters.query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (
    user_id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
    nickname TEXT NOT NULL,
    sex VARCHAR(10), -- 'male', 'female', 'unknown'
    age INT,
    area TEXT, -- Áî®Êà∑‰ΩçÁΩÆ
    qq_level INT, -- Áî®Êà∑ÁöÑQQÁ≠âÁ∫ß
    profile JSONB, -- ‰∫∫Áâ©Â∞è‰º†
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS group_members (
    user_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    group_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    
    -- Ê†∏ÂøÉÁæ§ÂÜÖ‰ø°ÊÅØ
    card_name TEXT,
    group_role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    special_title TEXT,
    member_level INT,
    
    -- Êó∂Èó¥Áõ∏ÂÖ≥
    joined_at TIMESTAMPTZ,
    last_sent_at TIMESTAMPTZ,
    title_expire_at TIMESTAMPTZ,
    shut_up_until TIMESTAMPTZ,
    
    -- Áä∂ÊÄÅ‰∏éÊùÉÈôê
    is_unfriendly BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, -- „Äê‰øùÁïô„ÄëÊ≠§Ê†áËÆ∞ÁâπÂÆö‰∫éÁæ§ÁªÑ
    is_card_changeable BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
    is_robot BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,

    -- Â§çÂêà‰∏ªÈîÆ
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, group_id)
);

SELECT 
  gm.user_id   AS "user_id",
  gm.group_id  AS "group_id",
  gm.card_name AS "card_name",
  u.nickname   AS "nickname"
FROM group_members gm
JOIN jsonb_to_recordset($1::jsonb) AS v(user_id text, group_id text)
  ON gm.user_id = v.user_id 
 AND gm.group_id = v.group_id
LEFT JOIN users u
  ON u.user_id = gm.user_id;

INSERT INTO group_members (
  user_id,
  group_id,
  card_name,
  group_role,
  special_title,
  member_level,
  joined_at,
  last_sent_at,
  title_expire_at,
  shut_up_until,
  is_unfriendly,
  is_card_changeable,
  is_robot
) VALUES (
  $1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6,
  to_timestamp($7),
  to_timestamp($8),
  to_timestamp($9),
  to_timestamp($10),
  $11, $12, $13
)
ON CONFLICT (user_id, group_id) DO UPDATE
SET
  card_name         = EXCLUDED.card_name,
  group_role        = EXCLUDED.group_role,
  special_title     = EXCLUDED.special_title,
  member_level      = EXCLUDED.member_level,
  joined_at         = EXCLUDED.joined_at,
  last_sent_at      = EXCLUDED.last_sent_at,
  title_expire_at   = EXCLUDED.title_expire_at,
  shut_up_until     = EXCLUDED.shut_up_until,
  is_unfriendly     = EXCLUDED.is_unfriendly,
  is_card_changeable= EXCLUDED.is_card_changeable,
  is_robot          = EXCLUDED.is_robot;

options.queryReplacement:
={{ [
  String($json.user_id ?? ''),
  String($json.group_id ?? ''),
  $json.card ?? '',
  $json.role ?? '',
  $json.title ?? '',
  Number($json.level ?? 0),
  Number($json.join_time ?? 0),
  Number($json.last_sent_time ?? 0),
  Number($json.title_expire_time ?? 0),
  Number($json.shut_up_timestamp ?? 0),
  Boolean($json.unfriendly),
  Boolean($json.card_changeable),
  Boolean($json.is_robot)
] }}

parameters.query:
WITH next_id AS (
    SELECT
        COALESCE(
            (
                SELECT MIN(gap) 
                FROM (
                    SELECT generate_series(1, COALESCE(MAX(num), 0) + 1) AS gap
                    FROM (
                        SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING(user_inner_id FROM 2) AS INT) AS num
                        FROM users
                    ) t
                ) g
                WHERE gap NOT IN (
                    SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING(user_inner_id FROM 2) AS INT) FROM users
                )
            ),
            1
        ) AS num
)
INSERT INTO users (
    user_id,
    nickname,
    sex,
    age,
    area,
    qq_level,
    user_inner_id
)
SELECT
    $1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6,
    'U' || LPAD(num::text, 3, '0')
FROM next_id
ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE
SET
    nickname = EXCLUDED.nickname,
    sex = EXCLUDED.sex,
    age = EXCLUDED.age,
    area = EXCLUDED.area,
    qq_level = EXCLUDED.qq_level,
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    user_inner_id = COALESCE(
        users.user_inner_id,  -- ‰øùÁïôÂ∑≤Êúâ ID
        EXCLUDED.user_inner_id -- Â¶ÇÊûú‰∏∫Á©∫ÂàôÁî®Êú¨Ê¨°ÁîüÊàêÁöÑ
    );
